front.title: A Revised Catalog of Available X.500 Implementations

author.organization: Lawrence Livermore National Laboratory, National Energy Research Supercomputer Center

abstract.t: This document is the result of a survey that gathered new or updated descriptions of currently available implementations of X.500, including commercial products and openly available offerings. This document is a revision of RFC 1292. We contacted each contributor in RFC 1292 and requested an update and published the survey template in several mailing lists and obtained new product descriptions.
This document contains detailed description of twenty six (26) X.500 implementations - DSAs, DUAs, and DUA interfaces.
